content.p: We train tomorrow's healthcare professionals who will go on to transform the lives of individuals and communities locally, nationally and internationally in the fields of nursing, midwifery, physiotherapy, sport rehabilitation, health promotion and public health and allied health. As part of our community you will; Develop the knowledge, skills and experience needed to succeed in your healthcare career Be part of an award-winning school that has a reputation for teaching and research excellence Interprofessional learning opportunities with students across the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences We have outstanding teaching, research and employability Ranked 5th in the UK for nursing by QS University World Rankings 2022 Ranked 4th in the UK for physiotherapy in the UK in The Guardian University Guide 2023 30 years' experience training health care profession with an excellent reputation for teaching and research: Outstanding graduate employability: 97.9% of our undergraduates secure graduate-level employment or further study within 15 months of graduation by *HESA Graduate Outcomes 2020. The Graduate Outcomes % is derived using The Guardian University Guide methodology. Before you register for your course you must have met the Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) checks and Occupational health requirements. Contact the team
